feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 03:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -13.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
